about_the_game:
Nothing is ever simple in Rosemont.

Rosemont, Namalia is a massive cultural city full of opportunities. People dream of going there to discover themselves. What people don't know is that the city is run by six different families: Avesio, Canazino, Feliciano, Felidatto, Finopaso and Peratili.

After the death of Sebastian's father, Livio Kittorio, Sebastian moves back to Rosemont where the mystery of his father leads him to joining the Felidatto family. However, odd disappearances and mysterious deaths begin to plague the city and what seems like a simple mystery turns to madness as his world is turned upside down.


🔸 Join the Meowfia and take on the other Families!
🔸 Get to know and max out 24 Friendships!
🔸 What is The Paramount Feather? As chaos reigns, this artifact the others are fighting to find could be yours.
detailed_description:
Nothing is ever simple in Rosemont.

Rosemont, Namalia is a massive cultural city full of opportunities. People dream of going there to discover themselves. What people don't know is that the city is run by six different families: Avesio, Canazino, Feliciano, Felidatto, Finopaso and Peratili.

After the death of Sebastian's father, Livio Kittorio, Sebastian moves back to Rosemont where the mystery of his father leads him to joining the Felidatto family. However, odd disappearances and mysterious deaths begin to plague the city and what seems like a simple mystery turns to madness as his world is turned upside down.


🔸 Join the Meowfia and take on the other Families!
🔸 Get to know and max out 24 Friendships!
🔸 What is The Paramount Feather? As chaos reigns, this artifact the others are fighting to find could be yours.

name: Fortune Familia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Sebastian Kittorio joins the Meowfia in order to figure out what happened to his father. However, a simple mystery and a life-changing decision turns to madness as Sebastian faces danger he never would have expected.
